docs.lead_paragraph: REACHING into her seventh-grader's schoolbag recently to borrow "Roget's Thesaurus,'' a mother found, sandwiched in between his "First Year Latin" and "Atlas of American History," a copy of "Story of O."

headline.main: The dirty book bit; Dirty books

docs.abstract: R Kramer article on rising prevalence of pornographic books among children of jr hs age; discusses parents dilemma of protecting children and yet avoiding 'censorship'
docs.snippet: REACHING into her seventh-grader's schoolbag recently to borrow "Roget's Thesaurus,'' a mother found, sandwiched in between his "First Year Latin" and "Atlas of American History," a copy of "Story of O."
